en: Unto thee, O Jehovah, will I call: My rock, be not thou deaf unto me; Lest, if thou be silent unto me, I become like them that go down into the pit.
hmr: Aw LALPA, ka ko ding che a ni hi, Ka lungpui, keimaa inthawk hin i na chu suksêt naw la; Chuong naw chun, nangin i mi tosan chun, Khur sûnga zu fehai ang elin hung um rawi ka tih.

en: Hear the voice of my supplications, when I cry unto thee, When I lift up my hands toward thy holy oracle.
hmr: Ka ko cheh a, ka kuthai hi i biekna hmun inthieng tieng ka phar chun, Lunginsiet ka hnina râwlhai hi lo ngai rawh.

en: Draw me not away with the wicked, And with the workers of iniquity; That speak peace with their neighbors, But mischief is in their hearts.
hmr: Mi rilohai le thil suksuolhai laia chun, Mi hnûkhmang sa naw rawh. Chuonghai chun an vênghai kuomah inremnna thu an hril hlak a, Nisienlakhawm, an lungrilhaia chun thil suksuolna a um zing sih a.

en: Give them according to their work, and according to the wickedness of their doings: Give them after the operation of their hands; Render to them their desert.
hmr: An thilthaw ang pei le, an thilthawhai a suolzie ang peiin thung la, An kuta an sinthaw ang peiin thung la; An suol man chu inhmutir rawh.

en: Because they regard not the works of Jehovah, Nor the operation of his hands, He will break them down and not build them up.
hmr: LALPA sinthawhai le, A kuta a thilthaw chu an ngaisak naw leiin, Ama chun anni chu siemṭha loin suksieng a tih.

en: Blessed be Jehovah, Because he hath heard the voice of my supplications.
hmr: Lunginsiet ka hnîna râwlhai hi a ngai hlak leiin, LALPA chu inpâkin um raw se.

en: Jehovah is my strength and my shield; My heart hath trusted in him, and I am helped: Therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; And with my song will I praise him.
hmr: LALPA chu ka hrâtna le ka phaw a na, Ka lungril hin ama chu a ring a; chuongchun, sanin ka um a, Chuleiin, ka lungril hi nasatakin a hlim a, Ka hla chun ama inpâk ka tih.

en: Jehovah is their strength, And he is a stronghold of salvation to his anointed.
hmr: LALPA chu an hrâtna a na, A hrieknâl ta ding chun sandamna kulbîng a nih.

en: Save thy people, and bless thine inheritance: Be their shepherd also, and bear them up for ever.
hmr: I mihai chu sandam la, i rochan chu malsâwm rawh: Anni chu châwm la, kumkhuoin pawm rawh.
